trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There was one other sighting in Houston on or around February 8th 2008
Summary: I saw a star in the southwest sky over Houston, TX, 2-8-2008, then it moved through the sky straight then a little zig then a zag
divs: sighting detailsi'm standing in my driveway about 6:10am, in houston, tx, harris county, 2\8\2008, getting ready to go to work on a very beautiful clear cold morning, looking up skyward and wondering if i will ever see a ufo. i look up towards the northwest sky and i see a star, then it moves! i blink and think my eyes are acting up. it moves again and through the sky straight towards the southeast and makes a quick little zig then a quick little zag, i mean very quickly! like a twitch in your eye quick. it goes straight again a little ways then a very quick zig zag again. it does it again. i'm thinking maybe it's a plane, but it's way to high in the sky and going too quickly. it still looks like a star, can't be a plane. it keeps going straight towards the southeast, quick little zig zags now and then, until it goes past a big star (planet? not sure) in the southeast sky. it passes the big star in the southeast about a quarter past it, the moving star just disappeares straight upwards, into the heavens. never to be seen by my eyes again! very interesting event in my life! never have i saw anything like that, ever! i've always wished i would see a ufo in my life time. do you guys think that's what i saw? i'm happy with this! a lower to earth, ufo would be great too! very thrilling! god bless us all!
